text:
Chuuya slightly smirked as he saw a small shiver running down Dazai's spine because of his words and the man smiled even more when the other arching his back as he pressed his body against his own, Chuuya gently ran one of his hands over Dazai's hip and to his stomach, slowly trailing his fingers down to the other's inner thighs.
— That's it~ ♡ You're so obedient darling~ ♡
trans:
Chuuya esquissa un petit sourire en voyant un frisson parcourir l'échine de Dazai à ses paroles. Son sourire s'élargit encore lorsque l'autre arqua le dos et pressa son corps contre le sien. Chuuya passa doucement une main sur la hanche de Dazai, remontant jusqu’à son ventre, avant de faire glisser lentement ses doigts vers l’intérieur de ses cuisses.
— C'est ça~ ♡ Tu es si obéissant, chéri~ ♡
